content.rendered:
Your loyalty makes a difference at the University of La Verne. The Green & Orange Society recognizes donors who provide consistent support to the university, at ANY level, over three (3) years or more.

The development of good, ripe fruit on an orange tree takes time and commitment. In the same way, your gifts over time, no matter the size, are necessary to cultivate a result that will impact generations of students at the University of La Verne.

Start your membership in the Green & Orange Society today. Commit to continuing your support in the future. Join others who believe the fruit reaped tomorrow is worth an investment today.

Green & Orange Society Recognition Levels

  • Individuals who achieve 25+ years of consecutive giving will be inducted as Lifetime Members and receive personal recognition from the university.

All other members will be appreciated through the annual Giving Society Reception.
